column2: caption="Findis of Aman" by [[:Category:Images by Elawen Altariel

column3: Elf]], the first child and daughter of [[Finwë]], the [[High King of the Noldor]] and [[Indis]], his second wife.  Findis' name is a combination of the names of her parents.

column1: During the [[Exile of the Noldor]] she remained with Indis and her younger brother [[Finarfin]] in [[Valinor]], where she apparently dwelt ever since.<ref>{{PM
Her name seems to be a combination of her parents' names. See [[Finwë#Etymology
